ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: remember, i said to use our darkness spells during that keep-away game ;) the arrows may not do much, but they add to the DOT that the darkness spell is
ygData.messageBody:
remember, i said to use our darkness spells during that keep-away game ;)
the arrows may not do much, but they add to the DOT that the darkness spell
is already doing to him. and of course you can throw other nuisance spells
on him, like disease cloud to slow his healing. this kind of slow whittling
away of hp is more in character for us anyway, since of course we would want
to torture a paladin before we finished him off ;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
